II. Purpose of Addendum
Relocation from 625 Yale St., Saginaw, MI 48601 to 1030 N. River Rd., Saginaw,
MI 48609
III. Methodology
On site walk through inspection was completed 11/04/2019.
IV. Description of Findings and Conclusions
The new location has more than enough rooms to accommodate the services for
the foster care program. There are an adequate number of rooms for foster care
case managers, supervisors, visitation rooms, file storage, and other
administrative support functions. Facility has undergone recent renovations and is
more than adequate/suitable for meeting the needs of staff and youth and families
to be served.
V. Recommendation
I recommend approval for the relocation of this child placing agency-private
program.
